articles.image_title: KRYVYI RIH, UKRAINE - MAY 09: In this aerial view, Ukrainian infantrymen and tank crews take part in a training exercise on May 09, 2022 near Kryvyi Rih, Ukraine. Infantry soldiers learned scenarios to survive when potentially confronted with a Russian tank closing in at close range. The frontline with Russian troops lies only 70km to the south in Kherson Oblast, most of which is controlled by Russia. (Photo by John Moore/Getty Images)
